name: Disable Administrative Share Creation at Startup
description: Administrative shares are hidden network shares created by Microsoft Windows NT operating systems that grant system administrators remote access to every disk volume on a network-connected system
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:HKLM\\System\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\LanmanServer\\Parameters\\* AND registry.path:(*AutoShareWks OR *AutoShareServer) AND winlog.event_data.Details:DWORD\ \(0x00000000\))`
